bug.author: qcy1026
bug.summary: How to convert the weights from pth to pt?
bug.description:
Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Go to '...' Click on '....' Scroll down to '....' See error
Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Desktop (please complete the following information):
OS: [e.g. iOS] Version [e.g. 22]
Smartphone (please complete the following information):
Device: [e.g. iPhoneXS] OS: [e.g. iOS8.1] Version [e.g. 22]

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/qcy1026>@qcy1026</denchmark-link> read the README before raising issues in the future: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3#darknet-conversion>https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3#darknet-conversion</denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/qcy1026>@qcy1026</denchmark-link> ah sorry, I just realized you're asking how to convert pytorch to pytorch. It's the same, you can use .pth or .pt. This repo uses .pt.
